title: By the King a proclamation for the keeping of markets to supply the city of London with provisions, and also for prevention of alarms and tumults, and for appointing the meeting of merchants.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, and Christopher ...,
notes: "Given at Our Court at Whitehall the sixth day of September 1666. in the Eighteenth year of Our Reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
